Data Fetching

Functions for fetching DraftKings data

Get Competitions for a Draft Group

Get Contest Info

Get Draft group

Get Draft Group Info

Get Leaderboard

Get List of Contests in Lobby

API Functions

Low-level functions for interacting with the DraftKings API

dk_req()
Create Draft Kings Request Object
dk_req_perform()
Perform Draft Kings API Request
dk_req_process()
Process Draft Kings Request Object
dk_resp_parse()
Parse Response JSON
